overview.title: Project Overview
description: In collaboration with TNO (Netherlands Organization for Applied Scientific Research) and Inholland University of Applied Sciences, we have developed the "Who Has Been Calling?" (WHBC) project. For this project, we completed a technical feasibility study, which included both a research report and conceptualization.

The project addresses the challenge of efficiently analyzing large volumes of audio data, a task that is time-consuming and error-prone when done manually. Our solution is an AI-driven system that automatically analyzes audio conversations, identifies speakers, and detects specific audio events, significantly improving the efficiency and accuracy of audio analysis.

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.description: Organizations face the task of efficiently processing and analyzing large volumes of audio data. Manual processing is time-consuming and error-prone, which can lead to missing important information and patterns.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: We have developed a software application that uses artificial intelligence to analyze and categorize audio data. The approach included:
steps: Speech Processing: Implementation of techniques such as MFCC (Mel-Frequency Cepstral Coefficients) for audio analysis.
Diarization: Development of a model to split conversations into different speakers.
Speaker Recognition: Implementation of AI models to identify individual speakers.
Audio Event Detection: Creation of a model to recognize specific events in audio.

technicalDetails.title: Technical Details
items: Application of deep learning and machine learning techniques.
Development of an API using Python Flask.
Integration with a PostgreSQL database for data management.
Experimentation with various AI models, including CNN, RNN, and hybrid architectures.

results.title: Results
results.conclusion: The system improves the efficiency of audio analysis and reduces the workload of analysts when processing large volumes of audio data.

future.title: Future Perspective
future.description: This project offers opportunities for further development in AI-driven audio analysis. It demonstrates the applicability of AI in solving complex data analysis problems and can lead to new applications in various sectors.
